link.title: How to use Chaos Hubs
link.description: This section describes how you can connect to a ChaosHub and how you can manage your ChaosHub. Connecting to a ChaosHub discusses the prerequisites and steps to add a custom hub. Managing a ChaosHub discusses how you can add experiments to a ChaosHub, Sync Harness with a ChaosHub Git repository, and launch an experiment from a ChaosHub.
